game.name: Beast Gang
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Place cards on a 5×5 board to complete hands in rows, columns, and diagonals in this fresh, casual puzzle game! Simple controls, deep strategy, and addictive combos await. Use items to turn the tide and push your score to the limit in endless mode!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Place cards on a 5×5 board to complete hands in rows, columns, and diagonals in this fresh, casual puzzle game! Simple controls, deep strategy, and addictive combos await. Use items to turn the tide and push your score to the limit in endless mode!
